articles.title: Trump threatens Chicago with apocalyptic force and Pritzker calls him a 'wannabe dictator'
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump is reportedly exploring ways to exert federal control over Chicago, with Illinois Governor J.B. Pritzker condemning the actions as those of a 'wannabe dictator.' The situation is escalating as Trump allegedly threatens 'apocalyptic force' against the city.

articles.title: Russia's largest air attack on Ukraine sets fire to main government building in Kyiv
articles.description: Ukraine's capital, Kyiv, was targeted by Russia's largest overnight air attack of the war, resulting in a fire at the main government building and the deaths of at least three people, including an infant. The attack highlights the ongoing conflict and its devastating impact.

articles.title: South Korea says it reached a deal to release workers detained in ICE raid
articles.description: South Korea has announced a diplomatic agreement with the United States to secure the release of over 300 South Korean nationals who were detained during an immigration enforcement raid at a Hyundai plant in Georgia.
